DimCyan/iOS-remote

Controls iOS devices via USB in a browser without jailbreaking

View on index

Related repos

  • Automates iOS devices on Linux and Windows
  • Controls smart home devices from Apple platforms
  • Turns webpages into desktop and mobile apps
  • Control Android devices from iOS or Android phones

  • AI agent that taps and types on your iPhone across apps
